column5: I hit a local area yesterday and today in search of walter.Binbrook cons area to be exact! So yesterday I spent most of the day trolling for walter,had a few hits and lost them as well.Soft nibbles! So I continued on working the drop offs!Whamm! a bucket mouth,bigger than the one I posted last!A little tailwalkin and a flip from his fin to me! I think it meant SEE YA Sucker! Anyway I continued onwards and well my line triggered again,it was surely big! My first smally for the season!yuppee!18 in long x 12.75 girth!You do the math! Well I went back today,a few soft hits and this little ugly bugger was hungry!Yuck!! So heres the pics and this lure needs to go to another ofner! For another adventure!!!!
don't ya just love those tail walking kiss off's
Yup,flippin me the bird and a little song and dance to boot!
You just never know what you will connect with when drifting harnesses. Not too shabby at all.
Not too shaby at all, biguli!
The nexy lucky contestant if willing is,DRUM ROLL >>>>>>>>>>> DAN BOUCK, come on down!!!!!
